com.joliciel.talismane.utils

Class CSVFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.utils.CSVFile

  • public class CSVFile
extends java.lang.Object
    A class allowing us to extract information from a CSV file.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        public java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String label)
        Return the string value of a cell, or null if the cell is not in the CSV file limits.
        Parameters:
        label - in standard Excel format, e.g. A1 for top-left.

      • getValue

        public java.lang.String getValue(int row,
                                 int column)
        Return the string value of a cell, or null if the cell is not in the CSV file limits.
        Parameters:
        row - zero-indexed row index, e.g. 0 for A1
        column - zero-indexed column index, e.g. 0 for A1
